thread.title: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola defends his leaky back-four after watching his ‘perfect plan’ blow up in his face in Champions League defeat
thread.title_full: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola defends his leaky back-four after watching his ‘perfect plan’ blow up in his face in Champions League defeat

author: tgannon
title: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola defends his leaky back-four after watching his ‘perfect plan’ blow up in his face in Champions League defeat
text:
EFL No back-flaw Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola defends his leaky back-four after watching his ‘perfect plan’ blow up in his face in Champions League defeat 
Etihad chief blasted over his tactics as he failed to reach European quarter-finals for first time in nine years of management By Martin Blackburn 16th March 2017, 12:17 am Updated: 16th March 2017, 12:25 am
